biotools.summary: Global repository for all bona fide protein structure data. Single worldwide repository of information about the 3D structures of large biological molecules, including proteins and nucleic acids. It also has RESTful interface to search and retrieve data from the Protein Data Bank (PDB).

bioschemas.name: The Protein Data Bank (PDB)
